General.Name: Asuransi Dayin Mitra Tbk
General.Description: PT Asuransi Dayin Mitra Tbk provides general insurance products and services in Indonesia. It operates through Fire, Marine Hull, Motor Vehicle, Accident, and Others segments. The company offers fire, motor vehicle, marine cargo, marine hull, aviation, money, personal accident, cyber risk, jewellery block, micro, and travel insurance products; heavy and movable equipment insurance products; insurance coverage for financial institutions caused by theft, employee dishonesty, forgery, and property damage as a result from criminal act; and insurance cover for financial protection to the businesses and dwelling houses. It also provides engineering insurance products, including contractor's all risks, erection all risks, machinery breakdown, electronic equipment, civil engineering completed risk, deterioration of stock, and boiler and pressure vessel insurance products; and liability insurance products, such as public, employer's, workmen compensation, comprehensive general, automobile, product, directors and officers, freight forwarder, and professional indemnity liability insurance products. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Asuransi Dayin Mitra Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Equity Development Investment Tbk.

1.Name: Mr. Purnama  Hadiwidjaja
1.Title: Director of the Fin. & Admin. Division, Corp. Sec. and Director
